1.「キハダさんっ。まだ 間に合います。| やめるなんて言わずに もう一度| 考え直: Kihada! It's not too late. Don't say you're|quitting, but please reconsider!

2.「げーっ また来たのかよ アンタ……。| うるせえなぁ。おれっちは| もう 木工: You're here again, aren't you... Shut up! I|have no interest in being a woodworker|anymore!

3.「郷里のお母さまが ご病気で| お金が必要だったのは わかります……。: I understand that your mother back home was|ill and needed money...

4.「でも うちに入門するとき 世界一の| 木工職人になって お城に 家具を献上する:
But when you first came to us, you said you|dreamed of becoming the world's best|woodworker and presenting furniture to the|
|castle!

5.「よう 邪魔するぜ キハダさん。| 金が返せねぇなら もういいかげん| こっちに: Hey, Kihada, you're in my way. If you can't|return the money, why don't you just leave|your body here already?

6.「うっ！ デュバルさん……。| わかりました……。今 行きます。: Ugh! Mr. Duval... okay... I'm coming.

7.「待って！ あなたたちは どなたです？| うちの職人を どこへ連れていく気ですか: Wait! Who are you people? Where are you taking|our craftsmen?

8.「もう いいんだ カンナさん……。| 夢じゃ 食っていけねぇんだ。: It's all right, Kanna... I can't eat from|dreams.

9.「ごちゃごちゃ言ってねーで 早く来い！| テメーらみたいな カビくせぇ木工職人じ: Stop messing around and get your ass over|here! You're a bunch of moldy woodworkers who|can't even pay your own interest!

12.「……アタシは 素材にも 道具にも| カビなんて生やさせたこたぁ ありゃしないよ: I would never allow mold to grow on my|materials or tools! I'm a proud craftsman!

13.「アンタらこそ 今 自分のやってることに| 誇りが あるってのかい！？| 胸張っ: Are you proud of what you are doing? Are you|proud of your work? What?

14.「キハダ！ アンタもアンタだよ！| 借金が苦しいからって 一度抱いた夢を| 捨て: Kihada! You're just like you! You're a|pathetic man who abandoned his dream just|because he's in debt!

16.「ちょ……ちょっと アニキ！| ツバクロのアニキ～！！: Hey, Big brother! Tsubakuro's big brother!

17.「なんじゃ 騒がしいのぅ。| オメーらで ちーたぁ片付けぇや……。: What's with all the noise? You guys better|clean up your mess...

18.「ん んん！？| ……もしや お嬢？ お嬢じゃろか？: Hm-mm! Is it... miss? Miss, is it?

19.「おや 誰かと思ったら ツバクロじゃないか。| ひさしぶりだね。: Well, look who it is, Tsubakuro. It's been a|while.

20.「フン……。一文無しで じいさんに拾われて| ギルドの 使い走りしてたアンタが: You, who were penniless and were picked up by|my grandfather to run errands for the guild,|now seem to be running a big ass business.

21.「まぁいいさ。アンタなら 話が早いよ。| これ 受け取ってくんな！ その代わり|: Well, that's all right. You're the fastest guy|I know. Take this! In exchange, you can clear|Kihada's debt.

22.「こ……こりゃ スミツボのオヤジさんが| 大事にしとった 家宝の木工刀じゃろ！？: This...this is pot's father's treasured|heirloom woodworking sword! I can't accept|such a precious thing!

23.「今のアタシにとって 門弟よか| 大事なモンなんて ないんでね。| じいさんも: There's nothing more important to me now than|my students. I'm sure your grandfather will|understand...

25.「まったく お嬢には かなわんのぉ。| ……ほいじゃ こりゃあ| わしが いっと: I'm no match for the young lady. Well then,|I'll leave you to it for the time being.

27.「キハダ！ そこの <pc>だって| イチから コツコツ がんばってんだよ。: Kihada! Even <pc> there is trying|hard from the very beginning.

28.「もう <color_yellow><%sEV_SYOK_HOSI><color:
I've grown up to be able to make more than|<%sev_yellow><%sev_syok_hosi>|<%sev_syok_item> now. You should start working|
|on it tomorrow!

29.「お嬢……。まるで スミツボのオヤジさんが| 生き返ったかのようじゃったわ……。: Miss... it was as if Mr. Pot had come back to|life...

30.「キハダさん。アンタのこたぁ 目をつむるけぇ| 木工ギルドで働ける 幸せをかみし:
Mr. Kihada. I'll close my eyes to what you're|doing... and just think how lucky you are to|be working for the Woodwork Guild... and do|
|your job well...
